text:
One of the first things I did as mayor was adopt legislation banning smoking in bars and restaurants. Other cities and states followed our lead.

text: Nine years ago today, an unspeakable evil came to Tucson. My good friend @GabbyGiffords is a survivor and a fighter, and her courage and leadership inspire me and the millions of Americans who honor the victims of gun violence with action. We will not let up.

text: Over the years, I've supported many candidates in Virginia. Tomorrow, for the first time in decades, Democrats will take control of the general assembly. I'm proud to have played a part in that progress, and I'm hopeful for what it means for the future of VA and our country.
text_html: Over the years, I've supported many candidates in Virginia. Tomorrow, for the first time in decades, Democrats will take control of the general assembly. I'm proud to have played a part in that progress, and I'm hopeful for what it means for the future of VA and our country.

text: It was a pleasure spending the morning with Mayor @LevarStoney.
